scripts.start: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.update:scss: sass ./src/components/button/button.scss ./src/components/button/button.css && sass ./src/components/input/input.scss ./src/components/input/input.css && sass ./src/pages/profile/profile.scss ./src/pages/profile/profile.css && sass ./src/components/talking-area/talking-area.scss ./src/components/talking-area/talking-area.css && sass ./src/pages/change-profile/change-profile.scss ./src/pages/change-profile/change-profile.css && sass ./src/pages/change-password/change-password.scss ./src/pages/change-password/change-password.css && sass ./src/pages/navigation/navigation.scss ./src/pages/navigation/navigation.css && sass ./src/pages/error/error.scss ./src/pages/error/error.css
